name: Date Picker - Solid
description: A date picker with a solid border

label.label: Label
label.description: The label to be displayed on the picker

mode.label: Mode
mode.description: Choose between date, time and datetime

assistiveText.label: Assistive text
assistiveText.description: Helper text to display below the picker

locale.label: Locale
locale.description: Locale for the datepicker. Must be a valid Locale

minuteInterval.label: Minute Interval
minuteInterval.description: The interval at which minutes can be selected

timeZoneOffsetInMinutes.label: Time zone offset
timeZoneOffsetInMinutes.description: By default, the datepicker uses the device's timezone. This will allow you to offset it

initialDate.label: Initial Date
initialDate.description: Optionally set an initial date to make your forms easier to work with

options.label: Options
options.description: Array of picker options. An array of objects containing a label and value.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: Whether the picker should be disabled. Will prevent selection and show a greyed out state.

error.label: Error
error.description: Whether the picker should display the error state

leftIconName.label: Left icon name
leftIconName.description: The icon to display on the left

leftIconMode.label: Left icon mode
leftIconMode.description: The mode of the icon to display on the left. 'inset' or 'outset'.

rightIconName.label: Right icon name
rightIconName.description: The icon to display on the right
